dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2830 IS: To permanently reauthorize the special diabetes programs for Indians.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tester (for himself, Mr. Johnson of South Dakota, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Begich, and Mr. Franken) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To permanently reauthorize the special diabetes programs for Indians.

section.text: Section 330C(c)(2)(C) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254câ€“3(c)(2)(C)) is amended by striking each of fiscal years 2004 through 2015 and inserting fiscal year 2004 and each fiscal year thereafter.
